meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a heroicomical work.
meanings.sent1: The heroicomical story was filled with brave heroes and funny moments.
meanings.sent2: The heroicomical play entertained the audience with its mix of heroism and humor.
meanings.sent3: The heroicomical movie had viewers laughing at the hero's silly antics.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to problem-solving was heroicomical, blending courage with comedy.
meanings.sent5: The heroicomical novel painted a vivid picture of a brave yet comical world.

meanings.definition: A work that combines elements of heroism and comedy.
meanings.sent1: The heroicomical was a hit at the theater, drawing in crowds with its mix of bravery and laughter.
meanings.sent2: In literature, a heroicomical often brings together the best of both heroism and humor.
meanings.sent3: The heroicomical on stage had the audience in stitches with its hilarious hero antics.
meanings.sent4: The heroicomical in the story was a symbol of courage wrapped in a cloak of comedy.
meanings.sent5: The heroicomical in the film left a lasting impression of a hero who could make you laugh and cry.
